name: Small Bathroom Rugs 17x24 Non Slip White Fluffy Bath Mat for Bathroom Floor Machine Washable Plush Luxury Bath Rug for Tub Soft Shaggy Absorbent Shower Mat

Give a cloud-like feeling for bare feet Effortless Maintenance: Thanks to its machine-washable design, cleaning the bath mat is a breeze. Reinforced stitching prevents unraveling during washes, and it retains its appearance through numerous cycles, making it a good choice for housewarming Elevate Your Bathroom Aesthetic: Crafted from recyclable materials, this premium bathroom mat gives safety to your loved ones. With six chic color options-white, grey, pink, blue, beige, and spa blue, it complements a wide range of bathroom decors Versatile Sizes for All Spaces: The Disolla bathroom rug comes in six sizes: 17x24, 20x32, 24x36, 24x48, 24x59 and 24x70 inches. name: CozeCube Bath mats for Bathroom Non Slip, Fluffy Shaggy Bath Rugs for Bathroom Washable, Extra Soft and Absorbent Microfiber Bath Rugs for Shower Sink, Kitchen Sink, Sage Green, 16" x 24"
short_description: 【Ultra-Plush Shaggy Feel】The Cozecube bathroom rugs are made of 100% premium microfiber which are ultra soft and cozy, the rug is about 0.8 inches thick so your feet can feel silky soft. The plush bath mat is perfect beside your bath, bed, or entranceway, making it easy to keep your whole home comfortable and tidy. 【Super Absorbent】With the extra soft absorbent premium microfiber material, the luxurious shag pile bath rugs can offer a cushy spot to dry off and keeping your room floors dry and clean. 【Safe Non-Slip Design】The upgraded TPE Rubber backing is durable for long lasting use compared with other TPR materials, which ensures that the mat stays perfectly in place, helping to prevent you from falling on slippery bathroom floors. The TPE backing can be recycled to save energy effectively which is strong, sticky, and durable, without the harsh chemicals of PVC. Warning: Do not place mat on wet surface. Make sure floors are dry underneath the rug to prevent the rug from slipping. 【Widely Used】The Cozecube bathroom rugs come with different colors and sizes creating a look of elegance to complement your decor. Also, it can be widely used as a bath mat, bathtub mat, bathroom rugs, door mats, bedroom rugs, dog bath mats, and foot bath mats. Wide Versatility. This is a multifunctional rug. Put them in living room to sit, in the entry way to keep the dust away from your house. 【Machine washable】This bathroom floor mats are machine washable with cold water and mild detergent (no chlorine or bleach) hang air dry. The Color will not fade and stay vibrant for years after washing it.

short_description: Non Slip Backing: Equipped with a strong TP rubber backed that grips firmly to the floor surface, preventing the mat from sliding or bunching up. name: OLANLY Bathroom Rug Set 2 Piece, Soft Absorbent Microfiber Bath Mats and U-Shaped Contour Toilet Rug, Non-Slip, Machine Wash Dry, Plush Shaggy Bath Mats for Bathroom (24"x16"+24"x20", Grey)
short_description: [Heavy Density Microfiber] The bath mats are made up of nearly one inch height premium thick, soft and fluffy microfiber, where with the help of unique fiber locking technique, the fluff is thicker, making it well-suited for bathroom, vanity, vacation home, master bedroom, kids’ bathroom, guest suite. [Long-lasting and Sturdy] Unlike other brands that use PVC or hot glue, we've built ours with a resilient TP rubber backing. While PVC and hot glue weaken over time, our TP rubber mats are designed to withstand repeated washing and drying. WARNING: Water under the bathroom rug can cause it to slip. Keep bottom of the bath rug dry! [Ultra-Absorbent & Quick Dry] The soft shaggy microfiber fabric, will not let the water drip on to the floors, when you are stepping out of your bath, shower or getting ready by the sink. Further, there is moisture trapped inside the mat’s deep pile, which allows the rug to dry quickly and cleanly. [Easy Maintenance] OLANLY bathroom mats can be machine washed separately with cold water, mild detergent which has no chlorine or bleach and tumble dry on low speed or hang dry. Also, the color will not fade and will stay vibrant for many years even with after washing and drying many times. [Beautiful Décor & Multipurpose] The bath rugs have unique geometric design, to provide beautiful décor to nearly any space in your bathroom. The mats work perfectly in front of your single or double sink, shower, bathtub or anywhere you want to have support and warmth to your feet.

short_description: Microfiber [ MULTIPLE MACHINE WASHES WITHOUT CLUMPING OR TANGLING ] Our fluffy bathroom rug can maintains its pristine shape and texture even after numerous machine washes. With an ability to resist sinking or flattening, our rug offers an unparalleled walking experience, akin to strolling on clouds. The rug's thickness and softness are especially convenient for tasks like bathing kids, providing a comfortable surface to kneel on [ ULTRA-ABSORBENT and QUICK-DRYING ] Our plush bath rugs for the bathroom showcase a dense pile of absorbent fibers that effortlessly soak up water. Step onto the mat with confidence right after your shower, preventing any water from being tracked onto your bathroom floor. The high-density material excels not only in moisture absorption but also in providing a cushioned haven for your feet, ensuring warmth and coziness even on the coldest tiles [ PATENTED NON-SLIP TPR BOTTOM FOR ENHANCED SAFETY ] Our bath rug featuring a patented hexagon suction cup-inspired bottom design that firmly anchors the mat in place. Engage in your bathroom activities with peace of mind, knowing you are safeguarded against slips and falls [ VERSATILE USAGE SCENARIOS ] Our luxury shaggy microfiber bathroom rugs effortlessly harmonize with various bathroom settings. With an array of colors and sizes to choose from, you can find the perfect fit for your decor. Enhance your shower, bathtub, master bathroom, kids' bathroom, or vanity area with these rugs. name: Non Slip Bath Mat Bathroom Rugs, Soft Braided Ultra Thin Bath Mats, Super Absorbent Quick Dry Bath Rug Shower Mat, Rubber Backing, Fit Under Door Bathroom Floor, Machine Washable, Brown 16"x24"
short_description: Non Slip Bath Mat & Anti-Leakage - Rubber backed non slip bath mat performs well in skid-resistance on smooth wet floor, comparing to other TPR or PVC backing. Durable rubber backing also stop water seeping underneath then flowing everywhere. Furthermore, the rubber bath mat won’t be smelly after being wet for long time. Ultra Thin Bath Mat - If you are looking for a bath rug that can fit under the door, here it is. Our bathroom mat features a thin enough rubber backing at the bottom that can fit under the door. With a thickness as low as 0.2 inches, you can place the non-slip bath mat behind a door without being entangled with fluff upon closing the door. Super Absorbent & Quick Dry Bath Mat - Our bathroom rugs feature low pile chenille woven design.When you get out of the tub or shower, the plush chenille fabric quickly absorbs dripping water, and our fabric also allows the rug to dry quickly in the open air, giving you a dry and comfortable bathroom. Easy To Clean - Bathroom rug mats are easy to clean and maintain. You can clean the thin bathroom mat with a vacuum cleaner or washing machine. The color will not fade or crack after washing. Please note: Machine wash in cold water with neutral detergent (no chlorine or bleach), tumble dry low temperature and low speed, machine wash in a mesh laundry bag for better results. Wide Use - Our bath mat is not only suitable for use in the bathroom but can also be used in various other areas of your home. Whether it's in the kitchen, laundry room, entryway, or any other high-traffic area,Its durable construction and non-slip rubber backing make it perfect for any space where you want to enhance safety and comfort.

name: PURRUGS Non-Slip Bathroom Rug 20" x 30" - Super Absorbent & Quick Dry Shaggy Microfiber Bath Mat, Machine Washable Plush Throw Rug for Bathtub, Shower and Sink, Beige
short_description: EXPERIENCE UNMATCHED SOFTNESS: Indulge in the unparalleled softness of our bathroom mats. REMARKABLE ABSORBENCY: Our bath rugs are designed to efficiently absorb moisture, keeping your bathroom dry and comfortable. Their high absorbency saves your floors from dripping water, making them ideal for stepping out of the bath or shower. Whether it's a quick splash or a relaxing soak, these bath rugs ensure a dry and welcoming bathroom space. STAY SAFE WITH NON-SLIP DESIGN: Your safety is paramount. Our bathroom rugs feature a non-slip backing to prevent any shifting or skidding, ensuring your peace of mind. It's a reliable choice for households with kids, seniors, or anyone seeking added stability in their daily routines. Whether you're stepping out of the shower room or bathtub, you can trust in the bath mat's stability and safety. EFFORTLESS MAINTENANCE: Cleaning and maintaining our bathroom mats couldn't be easier. No more worries about spills or stains – just easy, efficient cleaning. ECO-CONSCIOUS CHOICE: We take pride in using recycled GRS certified yarn in the construction of our bath rugs. By choosing our products, you're making an eco-conscious choice that supports sustainability and environmental responsibility. Enjoy the perfect blend of comfort, functionality, and environmental friendliness in your bathroom rugs. Your choice makes a positive impact on our planet while you relish the softness and practicality of our bathroom mats.
